text: The Slave is a 1918 British silent crime film directed by Arrigo Bocchi and starring Jean-Marie de l'Isle, Hayford Hobbs and Charles Vane. It was based on a novel by Robert Hichens.Goble p.956 ==Cast== * Jean-Marie de l'Isle as Lady Carroll Knox * Hayford Hobbs as Aubrey Herrick * Charles Vane as Sir Reuben Allabruth * Hettie Grossman as Diamond Manners * Ernest Wallace * Paul Courtenay ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. Walter de Gruyter, 1999. ==External links== * Category:1918 films Category:British films Category:British silent feature films Category:British crime drama films Category:English-language films Category:Films directed by Arrigo Bocchi Category:British black-and-white films Category:1918 crime drama films Category:Films based on British novels Category:1918 drama films
title: The Slave (1918 film)
